title: Introduction to HTML
description: Learn the basics of HTML

weekly_content.week_1: Learn HTML tags, basic structure, headings, paragraphs, and semantic elements.
weekly_content.week_2: Add images, links, lists, tables, and basic forms to create a complete HTML page.

title: CSS Fundamentals
description: Master the styling of web pages

weekly_content.week_1: CSS basics, syntax, selectors, text styling, and applying styles to HTML.
weekly_content.week_2: Box model, margins, padding, borders, display types, and positioning.
weekly_content.week_3: Responsive design with media queries, Flexbox, Grid, and styling a sample layout.

title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Master JavaScript and bring websites to life!

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to JavaScript: variables, data types, operators, and expressions.
weekly_content.week_2: Conditional statements, loops, arrays, and basic functions.
weekly_content.week_3: DOM manipulation, query selectors, and handling events.
weekly_content.week_4: Creating interactive features: form validation and small dynamic projects.

title: PHP Fundamentals
description: Master PHP to power up your websites!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to PHP, syntax, variables, and data types.
weekly_content.week_2: Control structures, loops, functions, and form handling.
weekly_content.week_3: Working with files, sessions, cookies, and error handling.
weekly_content.week_4: Connecting PHP to MySQL and building a mini CRUD project.

title: SQL Database
description: Master SQL - Speak Database Fluently!

weekly_content.week_1: Understanding databases, SQL syntax, SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE.
weekly_content.week_2: WHERE clause, filtering data, JOIN operations, and table relationships.
weekly_content.week_3: Aggregate functions, GROUP BY, HAVING, and basic normalization principles.

title: Python
description: Master Python - Build Anything from Apps to AI!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Python, syntax, variables, and basic I/O.
weekly_content.week_2: Lists, tuples, dictionaries, sets, and control flow statements.
weekly_content.week_3: Functions, modules, file handling, and exception management.
weekly_content.week_4: Object-oriented programming: classes, objects, inheritance.
weekly_content.week_5: Exploring standard libraries and a mini project using core concepts.

title: Java
description: Master Java - Powerhouse of Enterprise Development!

weekly_content.week_1: Java setup, variables, data types, operators, and control flow.
weekly_content.week_2: OOP concepts: classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation.
weekly_content.week_3: Exception handling, arrays, strings, and wrapper classes.
weekly_content.week_4: Collections (List, Set, Map), generics, and file input/output.
weekly_content.week_5: Hands-on mini project using all covered topics.

title: C/C++
description: The Backbone of High-Performance Programming!

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to C syntax, variables, input/output, operators, and control structures.
weekly_content.week_2: Functions, arrays, pointers, and memory addressing.
weekly_content.week_3: Structures in C, dynamic memory allocation, and file I/O.
weekly_content.week_4: Intro to C++: classes, constructors, destructors, and OOP basics.
weekly_content.week_5: Advanced OOP in C++, inheritance, polymorphism, and final project.

title: Networking
description: Where Devices Talk, and Data Travels!

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to computer networks, types, and topologies.
weekly_content.week_2: IP addressing, binary math, and subnetting.
weekly_content.week_3: OSI model and TCP/IP stack with real-world analogies.
weekly_content.week_4: Switching and routing fundamentals.
weekly_content.week_5: DHCP, DNS, NAT, and static vs dynamic IPs.
weekly_content.week_6: Wireless networks, access points, and configurations.
weekly_content.week_7: Firewalls, packet filtering, and port forwarding.
weekly_content.week_8: Common tools for network troubleshooting (ping, traceroute, nslookup).
weekly_content.week_9: Network security best practices and intro to VPNs.

title: Git & GitHub
description: Mastering Version Control and Team Collaboration!

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to Git, repositories, and basic commands (init, clone, add, commit).
weekly_content.week_2: Branching, merging, resolving conflicts, and local workflows.
weekly_content.week_3: Using GitHub: pushing, pull requests, forks, and team collaboration.

title: Data Structures & Algorithms
description: The Engine Behind Efficient Code!

weekly_content.week_1: Arrays, strings, and basic algorithm analysis (Big-O).
weekly_content.week_2: Stacks and queues: implementation and applications.
weekly_content.week_3: Singly and doubly linked lists.
weekly_content.week_4: Trees: binary trees, traversal algorithms, and BSTs.
weekly_content.week_6: Searching and sorting: binary search, quicksort, mergesort.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Crafting Apps for Every Pocket and Platform!

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to mobile development, IDE setup, and UI layout basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Handling user input, navigation, and routing.
weekly_content.week_3: State management and responsive design.
weekly_content.week_4: Working with REST APIs, JSON, and HTTP requests.
weekly_content.week_6: Build, test, and deploy mobile apps to stores or emulators.

title: Machine Learning
description: Turning Data into Intelligence!

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to ML, types of learning, and basic Python libraries.
weekly_content.week_2: Supervised learning: linear and logistic regression.
weekly_content.week_3: Decision trees, overfitting, and ensemble methods.
weekly_content.week_4: Unsupervised learning: k-means clustering and dimensionality reduction.
weekly_content.week_5: Data preprocessing, feature scaling, and encoding.
weekly_content.week_6: Model evaluation: accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score.
weekly_content.week_8: End-to-end ML project with scikit-learn and real data.

title: DevOps
description: Automating Development, Deployment, and Delivery!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to DevOps culture and practices.
weekly_content.week_2: Version control and continuous integration basics.
weekly_content.week_3: Containerization concepts and Docker fundamentals.
weekly_content.week_4: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform and Ansible.
weekly_content.week_5: Continuous deployment and monitoring tools setup.
weekly_content.week_6: End-to-end automated pipeline project.

title: Cloud Computing
description: Hosting, Scaling, and Innovating in the Cloud!
skills: AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud basics

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to cloud computing and service models.
weekly_content.week_2: Overview of major cloud providers: AWS, Azure, GCP.
weekly_content.week_3: Setting up and managing virtual machines and containers.
weekly_content.week_4: Cloud storage options and managed databases.
weekly_content.week_5: Serverless computing and cloud security fundamentals.
weekly_content.week_6: Deploying scalable applications on the cloud.

title: Cybersecurity
description: Shielding the Digital World from Threats!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to cybersecurity and threat landscape.
weekly_content.week_2: Understanding network security principles.
weekly_content.week_3: Cryptography and encryption methods.
weekly_content.week_4: Ethical hacking techniques and penetration testing.
weekly_content.week_6: Incident response and digital forensics.
weekly_content.week_7: Hands-on security tools and final project.

title: Data Analytics
description: Unlock the Power of Data to Drive Smart Decisions!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to data analytics and data lifecycle.
weekly_content.week_2: Data collection methods and cleaning techniques.
weekly_content.week_3: Exploratory data analysis and visualization basics.
weekly_content.week_4: Statistical methods for data analysis.
weekly_content.week_5: Using SQL for querying and managing data.
weekly_content.week_6: Business intelligence tools and dashboards.
weekly_content.week_7: Capstone project: end-to-end data analytics workflow.

title: Artificial Intelligence
description: Build intelligent systems that think, learn, and adapt!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to AI and intelligent agents.
weekly_content.week_2: Search algorithms: uninformed and informed search.
weekly_content.week_3: Knowledge representation and reasoning.
weekly_content.week_4: Logic-based AI and rule-based systems.
weekly_content.week_6: Deep learning and introduction to TensorFlow/PyTorch.
weekly_content.week_8: AI ethics, societal impact, and final project.

title: Game Development
description: Create Immersive Worlds with Code, Design, and Creativity!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to game development and design basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Getting started with a game engine (Unity/Godot).
weekly_content.week_3: Programming fundamentals for games.
weekly_content.week_4: 2D game creation: sprites, input, and collision.
weekly_content.week_6: Physics, animation, and particle effects.
weekly_content.week_9: Final project: build and publish a small game.

title: Full Stack Development
description: Master Both Frontend & Backend to Build Complete Web Apps!

weekly_content.week_1: Web fundamentals: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Advanced JavaScript and ES6 features.
weekly_content.week_3: Frontend frameworks introduction and setup.
weekly_content.week_4: Backend fundamentals: Node.js and Express.js.
weekly_content.week_5: Databases: SQL and NoSQL concepts and usage.
weekly_content.week_6: Building RESTful APIs and GraphQL basics.
weekly_content.week_10: Final project: build a full stack web application.

title: Software Engineering
description: Design, Build, and Maintain High-Quality Software Systems!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to software engineering and SDLC.
weekly_content.week_2: Requirements gathering and analysis techniques.
weekly_content.week_3: Software design principles and patterns.
weekly_content.week_4: Architecture styles: monolith, microservices, layered.
weekly_content.week_5: Version control with Git and collaborative workflows.
weekly_content.week_6: Software testing fundamentals and methodologies.
weekly_content.week_10: Project documentation and final team project.

title: Data Science
description: Turn Raw Data into Powerful Insights and Predictions!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to data science and data lifecycle.
weekly_content.week_2: Data wrangling and preprocessing techniques.
weekly_content.week_3: Exploratory data analysis and visualization.
weekly_content.week_4: Statistical foundations for data science.
weekly_content.week_6: Big data concepts and tools overview.
weekly_content.week_8: Data storytelling and final capstone project.

title: Natural Language Processing
description: Make machines understand and speak human language.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to NLP and text preprocessing.
weekly_content.week_2: Syntax, semantics, and part-of-speech tagging.
weekly_content.week_3: Sentiment analysis and text classification.
weekly_content.week_4: Sequence models: RNNs, LSTMs, and attention.
weekly_content.week_6: Building practical NLP applications and chatbots.

title: Blockchain Development
description: Step into the future of decentralized technology!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to blockchain technology and history.
weekly_content.week_2: Cryptography and how blockchain secures data.
weekly_content.week_3: Smart contracts basics and Solidity syntax.
weekly_content.week_4: Building and deploying smart contracts on Ethereum.
weekly_content.week_6: Interacting with blockchain using Web3.js.

title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
description: Gain skills to design clean and maintainable software!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to OOP and class design.
weekly_content.week_2: Encapsulation and data hiding techniques.
weekly_content.week_3: Inheritance and polymorphism explained.
weekly_content.week_4: Abstract classes, interfaces, and design patterns.
weekly_content.week_6: Unit testing and debugging OOP applications.

title: UI/UX Design
description: Create engaging and user-friendly digital experiences!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to UI/UX and user-centered design.
weekly_content.week_2: Conducting user research and creating personas.
weekly_content.week_3: Wireframing and prototyping basics.
weekly_content.week_4: Visual and interaction design principles.
weekly_content.week_6: Accessibility and final project presentation.

title: Robotics
description: Create smart robots with code and hardware!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to robotics and system components.
weekly_content.week_2: Microcontrollers and interfacing sensors.
weekly_content.week_3: Actuators, motors, and movement basics.
weekly_content.week_4: Robot kinematics and dynamics fundamentals.
weekly_content.week_6: ROS basics and robot software architecture.
weekly_content.week_8: Robot vision, AI integration, and final project.

title: Deep Learning
description: Go deeper into the neural networks powering today’s AI revolution!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to deep learning and neural networks.
weekly_content.week_2: Feedforward networks and backpropagation.
weekly_content.week_3: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for images.
weekly_content.week_4: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) and sequence modeling.
weekly_content.week_6: Transfer learning and advanced optimization.

title: Generative AI (GenAI)
description: Create content, images, and ideas with AI that learns to generate!

weekly_content.week_1: Overview of generative AI and model types.
weekly_content.week_2: Variational Autoencoders explained.
weekly_content.week_3: Generative Adversarial Networks fundamentals.
weekly_content.week_4: Transformers and attention mechanisms.
weekly_content.week_5: Applications: text, image, and audio generation.
weekly_content.week_6: Ethics and responsible AI, final project.

title: Laravel
description: Build powerful and elegant web apps with Laravel!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Laravel and MVC basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Routing, controllers, and middleware.
weekly_content.week_3: Blade templating and frontend integration.
weekly_content.week_4: Database management with Eloquent ORM.
weekly_content.week_6: Testing, debugging, and deploying Laravel apps.

title: MERN Stack
description: Build full-stack apps with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to MERN stack and setup.
weekly_content.week_2: MongoDB and database modeling.
weekly_content.week_3: Building REST APIs with Express and Node.js.
weekly_content.week_4: React fundamentals and component-based UI.
weekly_content.week_5: Advanced React and state management with Redux.
weekly_content.week_6: User authentication and authorization.

title: React
description: Build fast, interactive user interfaces with React!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to React and JSX syntax.
weekly_content.week_2: Components, props, and state basics.
weekly_content.week_3: Using hooks for state and lifecycle.
weekly_content.week_4: Routing and navigation with React Router.
weekly_content.week_5: Global state management: Context API and Redux.
weekly_content.week_6: Testing and optimizing React apps.

title: Ruby Programming
description: Write clean, elegant, and expressive code with Ruby!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Ruby and basic syntax.
weekly_content.week_2: Object-oriented concepts in Ruby.
weekly_content.week_3: Blocks, Procs, lambdas, and enumerables.
weekly_content.week_4: Exception handling and file operations.

title: Spring Boot
description: Build production-ready Java applications fast with Spring Boot!
skills: Data Access with Spring Data JPA

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Spring Boot and project setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Dependency injection and configuration.
weekly_content.week_3: Building RESTful APIs with Spring MVC.
weekly_content.week_4: Data access using Spring Data JPA.
weekly_content.week_6: Testing, deployment, and final project.

title: Docker
description: Containerize your apps for portability, speed, and scalability!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to containerization and Docker basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Working with Docker images and containers.
weekly_content.week_3: Writing Dockerfiles and building custom images.
weekly_content.week_4: Docker Compose and multi-container applications.

title: Kubernetes
description: Orchestrate containers at scale with Kubernetes!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Kubernetes and its architecture.
weekly_content.week_2: Managing pods, services, and deployments.
weekly_content.week_3: ConfigMaps, Secrets, and environment variables.
weekly_content.week_4: Scaling applications and load balancing.
weekly_content.week_5: Persistent storage and volumes in Kubernetes.
weekly_content.week_6: Helm package manager and monitoring solutions.

title: .NET Development
description: Develop enterprise-grade applications using .NET!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to .NET ecosystem and C# basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Object-oriented programming with C#.
weekly_content.week_3: Building web apps with ASP.NET Core MVC.
weekly_content.week_4: Data access using Entity Framework Core.
weekly_content.week_6: Security: authentication and authorization.

title: C# Programming
description: Develop modern applications with one of the most powerful object-oriented languages!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to C# and programming basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Classes, objects, and OOP principles.
weekly_content.week_3: Exception handling and debugging.
weekly_content.week_4: Working with LINQ and collections.
weekly_content.week_6: File operations and unit testing.

title: Angular
description: Build dynamic and scalable web applications with Angular!

weekly_content.week_1: Getting started with Angular and project setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Components, templates, and data binding.
weekly_content.week_3: Directives and pipes in Angular.
weekly_content.week_4: Services, dependency injection, and routing.
weekly_content.week_6: State management with NgRx and final project.

title: Theory of Computation
description: Explore the mathematical foundations of computer science!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to automata and formal languages.
weekly_content.week_2: Finite automata and regular languages.
weekly_content.week_3: Context-free grammars and pushdown automata.
weekly_content.week_4: Turing machines and decidability.
weekly_content.week_6: Complexity theory and classes P, NP.

title: MATLAB
description: Master numerical computing and data analysis with MATLAB!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to MATLAB and workspace.
weekly_content.week_2: Matrix operations and programming basics.
weekly_content.week_3: Data visualization and plotting techniques.
weekly_content.week_4: Numerical methods and algorithm implementation.

title: Hadoop
description: Handle big data with Apache Hadoop and ecosystem tools!
skills: Data Ingestion with Sqoop and Flume

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Hadoop and big data concepts.
weekly_content.week_2: HDFS architecture and data storage.
weekly_content.week_3: MapReduce programming model.
weekly_content.week_4: Data querying with Hive and Pig.
weekly_content.week_6: Data ingestion and ecosystem tools.

title: Computer Hardware
description: Understand the physical components that power computing!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to computer hardware and architecture.
weekly_content.week_2: Understanding CPUs and memory systems.
weekly_content.week_3: Storage devices and technologies.
weekly_content.week_4: Input/output and peripheral hardware.
weekly_content.week_6: Hardware troubleshooting and maintenance.

title: Foundations of Computer Science
description: Build a solid base in essential computer science concepts!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to computer science and problem solving.
weekly_content.week_2: Discrete mathematics fundamentals.
weekly_content.week_3: Algorithms and data structures basics.
weekly_content.week_4: Logic, proofs, and computational thinking.
weekly_content.week_6: Complexity and computability theory.

title: Kotlin Programming
description: Build modern Android apps with Kotlin — clean, safe, and concise!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Kotlin and environment setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Basic syntax and control flow.
weekly_content.week_3: Object-oriented and functional programming.
weekly_content.week_4: Coroutines and asynchronous tasks.
weekly_content.week_6: Testing, debugging, and best practices.

title: Swift Programming
description: Develop iOS apps with Swift — Apple’s powerful and intuitive language!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Swift and Xcode setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Basic syntax, control flow, and data types.
weekly_content.week_3: OOP and protocol-oriented programming.
weekly_content.week_4: Error handling and concurrency concepts.
weekly_content.week_5: Introduction to SwiftUI and building UI.
weekly_content.week_6: Testing, debugging, and app deployment.

title: Firebase
description: Build real-time apps faster with Firebase’s backend-as-a-service!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Firebase and project setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Authentication and user management.
weekly_content.week_3: Realtime Database and Firestore basics.
weekly_content.week_4: Cloud Functions and serverless backend.

title: Flutter Development
description: Build beautiful, cross-platform apps from a single codebase with Flutter!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Dart and Flutter setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Building UI with Flutter widgets.
weekly_content.week_3: State management techniques.
weekly_content.week_4: Navigation, routing, and user input.
weekly_content.week_6: Animations and app deployment.

title: Operating System
description: Understand the software that powers and controls computers!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to operating systems and history.
weekly_content.week_2: Processes, threads, and multitasking.
weekly_content.week_3: Memory management and virtual memory.
weekly_content.week_4: File systems and storage management.
weekly_content.week_6: Security, protection, and final project.

title: Digital Logic Design
description: Learn how computers think at the most fundamental level!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to digital logic and Boolean algebra.
weekly_content.week_2: Basic logic gates and circuit simplification.
weekly_content.week_3: Combinational logic design techniques.
weekly_content.week_4: Sequential circuits and flip-flops.
weekly_content.week_6: Finite state machines and final project.

title: Scala Programming
description: Write concise and scalable applications with Scala!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Scala and environment setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Basic syntax and functional programming.
weekly_content.week_3: Object-oriented programming in Scala.
weekly_content.week_4: Collections and pattern matching.
weekly_content.week_6: Testing, debugging, and project.

title: Pascal Programming
description: Learn foundational programming concepts with Pascal!

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Pascal and programming basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Control structures and data types.
weekly_content.week_3: Functions, procedures, and modular programming.
weekly_content.week_4: File handling and arrays.

title: Landing a Tech Job
description: Turn your skills into a career in tech! Learn how to build a standout resume, ace interviews, and land your dream job in software, data, IT, or design.

weekly_content.week_1: Crafting a standout resume and cover letter.
weekly_content.week_2: Preparing for technical and behavioral interviews.
weekly_content.week_3: Building a professional network and personal brand.
weekly_content.week_4: Job search strategies, negotiations, and next steps.

title: Game Development with Godot
description: Create 2D and 3D games with a powerful open-source engine! Learn Godot’s interface, scripting, and game design workflows from scratch.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Godot interface and project setup.
weekly_content.week_2: GDScript basics and scripting fundamentals.
weekly_content.week_3: Creating 2D games and handling input.
weekly_content.week_4: 3D game development and scene management.
weekly_content.week_6: UI design and exporting your game.

title: Web Development with Django
description: Build powerful and secure web applications with Python and Django! Learn to create full-featured web apps using models, views, templates, and more.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Django and project setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Models and database migrations.
weekly_content.week_3: Views and templates for dynamic content.
weekly_content.week_4: User authentication and permissions.
weekly_content.week_5: Building APIs with Django REST Framework.
weekly_content.week_6: Deployment and web security best practices.

title: API Development
description: Connect the digital world by building and consuming APIs! Learn how to design RESTful services, handle authentication, and integrate powerful third-party APIs.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to APIs and REST principles.
weekly_content.week_2: Designing and building RESTful services.
weekly_content.week_3: Authentication, tokens, and security.
weekly_content.week_4: API documentation and third-party integrations.

title: Game Theory
description: Understand strategic decision-making in competitive environments! Learn about payoffs, strategies, and Nash equilibrium through real-world scenarios.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to game theory and key concepts.
weekly_content.week_2: Understanding payoff matrices and strategies.
weekly_content.week_3: Nash equilibrium and dominant strategies.
weekly_content.week_4: Sequential and extensive form games.
weekly_content.week_6: Applications in economics, AI, and beyond.

title: Lua Programming
description: Write fast, lightweight scripts for games, apps, and embedded systems! Learn Lua syntax, tables, and integration with platforms like Roblox and Love2D.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Lua and basic syntax.
weekly_content.week_2: Tables, functions, and control structures.
weekly_content.week_3: Advanced Lua: metatables, metamethods, coroutines.
weekly_content.week_4: Lua integration with Roblox and Love2D.

title: Go Programming (Golang)
description: Build fast, reliable, and scalable software with Go! Learn concurrency, networking, and backend development with Google’s powerful language.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Go and environment setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Basic syntax, types, and control flow.
weekly_content.week_3: Concurrency with goroutines and channels.
weekly_content.week_4: Building web servers and networking.

title: Rust Programming
description: Build blazing-fast and memory-safe software with Rust! Learn the ownership model, error handling, and multithreading to write secure, high-performance apps.
skills: Error Handling with Result and Option

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Rust and environment setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Ownership, borrowing, and references.
weekly_content.week_3: Error handling and pattern matching.
weekly_content.week_4: Lifetimes and advanced type system.
weekly_content.week_6: Building projects and deployment.

title: Game Development with Unreal Engine
description: Master Unreal Engine to create breathtaking 3D games and experiences! Learn Unreal’s interface, Blueprint visual scripting, C++ programming, rendering, physics, and deployment workflows.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Unreal Engine and project setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Using Blueprints for visual scripting basics.
weekly_content.week_3: C++ integration and gameplay programming.
weekly_content.week_4: Level design and environment creation.
weekly_content.week_6: Lighting, shadows, and rendering optimization.

title: Cryptography
description: Secure data and communications by mastering the art and science of cryptography. Learn encryption algorithms, protocols, and practical applications to protect digital information.
skills: Practical Applications and Security Best Practices

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to cryptography and historical ciphers.
weekly_content.week_2: Symmetric key cryptography and block ciphers.
weekly_content.week_3: Asymmetric cryptography and public key infrastructure.
weekly_content.week_4: Hash functions, message digests, and integrity.
weekly_content.week_6: Cryptographic protocols like TLS and SSL.

title: Computer Vision
description: Teach machines to see and understand images and videos! Learn core computer vision techniques, image processing, and deep learning models used in real-world applications.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to computer vision and image basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Image filtering, transformations, and enhancement.
weekly_content.week_3: Feature detection and keypoint extraction.
weekly_content.week_4: Object detection techniques and models.
weekly_content.week_6: Convolutional neural networks (CNNs) fundamentals.
weekly_content.week_7: Using OpenCV and TensorFlow for vision tasks.
weekly_content.week_8: Real-time video processing and project deployment.

title: F# Programming
description: Discover functional-first programming with F#! Learn to build robust, concise, and scalable applications using this powerful .NET language.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to F# and functional programming.
weekly_content.week_2: Basic syntax, data types, and functions.
weekly_content.week_3: Pattern matching and immutable data structures.
weekly_content.week_4: Collections, sequences, and pipelines.
weekly_content.week_6: Working with type providers and .NET interop.

title: TypeScript Programming
description: Supercharge your JavaScript with TypeScript! Learn static typing, modern ES features, and build large-scale applications with confidence.
skills: Classes, Inheritance, and OOP in TypeScript
Working with TypeScript in React or Node.js

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to TypeScript, setup, and basic types.
weekly_content.week_2: Functions, arrays, tuples, and enums.
weekly_content.week_3: Interfaces, custom types, and generics.
weekly_content.week_4: Classes, inheritance, and OOP principles.
weekly_content.week_6: Using TypeScript with real projects (React, Node).

title: Node.js Development
description: Build scalable backend applications using Node.js! Learn to create servers, APIs, and real-time apps with JavaScript on the server side.
skills: Asynchronous Programming with Callbacks and Promises

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Node.js, setup, and core modules.
weekly_content.week_2: Asynchronous programming: callbacks, promises, and async/await.
weekly_content.week_3: Building web servers and REST APIs with Express.js.
weekly_content.week_4: Connecting Node.js with databases (MongoDB/SQL).
weekly_content.week_6: Real-time communication with WebSockets and deployment.

title: Haskell Programming
description: Master functional programming with Haskell! Learn pure functions, lazy evaluation, type systems, and monads to write elegant and high-assurance software.
skills: Type Inference and Algebraic Data Types

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Haskell, pure functions, and recursion.
weekly_content.week_2: Types, type inference, and algebraic data types.
weekly_content.week_3: Pattern matching, lists, and higher-order functions.
weekly_content.week_4: Lazy evaluation and infinite data structures.
weekly_content.week_6: Practical Haskell: building and running real apps.

title: AWS Essentials
description: Launch your cloud journey with Amazon Web Services! Learn the core AWS services, architecture, and best practices for deploying scalable, secure, and cost-effective solutions.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to cloud computing and AWS ecosystem.
weekly_content.week_2: Compute services: EC2, AMIs, auto-scaling, and load balancing.
weekly_content.week_3: Storage services: S3, EBS, Glacier, and lifecycle policies.
weekly_content.week_4: Databases: RDS, DynamoDB, and database best practices.
weekly_content.week_5: Security with IAM, roles, policies, and encryption.
weekly_content.week_6: Monitoring, cost management, and app deployment workflow.

title: Prompt Engineering for AI
description: Unlock the full potential of AI tools like ChatGPT, DALL·E, and Midjourney by mastering the art of prompt engineering. Learn how to craft effective prompts for coding, writing, design, and productivity.
skills: Understanding Language Models and AI Tools
Prompting for Code, Content, and Image Generation
Evaluating and Iterating Prompts for Accuracy
Prompt Engineering Tools and APIs (OpenAI, Midjourney)

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to prompt engineering and large language models (LLMs).
weekly_content.week_2: Effective prompting techniques: structure, constraints, roles, and chain-of-thought.
weekly_content.week_3: Prompting for productivity: writing, coding, and problem solving.
weekly_content.week_4: Advanced prompts for image generation and multi-modal tools (DALL·E, Midjourney).
weekly_content.week_5: Testing, evaluating, and deploying prompts in real-world AI workflows.

title: Building Chat Apps with Socket.IO
description: Create real-time chat applications using Node.js and Socket.IO! Learn the fundamentals of WebSockets, real-time event handling, and scalable server-side messaging.
skills: Handling Users, Rooms, and Message Broadcasting
Integrating Node.js and Express with Socket.IO
Deploying Real-Time Apps on Cloud Platforms

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to WebSockets and setting up Node.js with Socket.IO.
weekly_content.week_2: Creating basic chat features: messaging, rooms, and events.
weekly_content.week_3: Building the chat UI with HTML/CSS and connecting it to the backend.
weekly_content.week_4: Authentication, user handling, and chat persistence.
weekly_content.week_5: Advanced features: typing indicators, emojis, deployment, and scalability tips.

title: Software Testing & Quality Assurance
description: Ensure your software works flawlessly! Learn testing methodologies, automation, and QA best practices to deliver high-quality, bug-free applications.
skills: Automation Testing with Selenium and Jest

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to software testing, QA fundamentals, and test planning.
weekly_content.week_2: Manual testing techniques and writing test cases.
weekly_content.week_3: Unit testing basics and Test-Driven Development (TDD).
weekly_content.week_4: Automation testing with Selenium WebDriver and Jest.
weekly_content.week_5: Integration testing, system testing, and regression testing.
weekly_content.week_6: Continuous testing, CI pipelines, bug tracking, and reporting.

title: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs)
description: Build fast, reliable, and engaging web apps that work offline and feel like native apps. Learn how to use modern web APIs to create installable, responsive PWAs.
skills: Using Frameworks and Tools for PWAs

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to PWAs, benefits, and setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Implementing Service Workers for offline support.
weekly_content.week_3: Creating Web App Manifests and enabling installability.
weekly_content.week_4: Adding push notifications and background sync.

title: Symfony Framework
description: Build robust and scalable PHP applications with Symfony! Learn MVC architecture, routing, templating, and advanced features for enterprise-level projects.

weekly_content.week_1: Getting started with Symfony and project setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Routing, controllers, and request handling.
weekly_content.week_3: Using Twig for templating and frontend integration.
weekly_content.week_4: Database interaction with Doctrine ORM.
weekly_content.week_6: Form management, testing, and deploying Symfony apps.

title: Hibernate ORM Framework
description: Master Hibernate to simplify database interactions in Java applications! Learn object-relational mapping (ORM), data persistence, and advanced querying techniques.
skills: Criteria API and Native SQL Queries

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Hibernate and ORM concepts.
weekly_content.week_2: Mapping entities and relationships.
weekly_content.week_3: Session management and transactions.
weekly_content.week_4: Querying with HQL and Criteria API.
weekly_content.week_6: Integrating Hibernate with Spring and best practices.

title: Flask Web Development
description: Build lightweight and scalable web applications with Flask, a popular Python micro-framework. Learn routing, templating, database integration, and RESTful APIs.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Flask and creating your first app.
weekly_content.week_2: Routing, templates, and static files.
weekly_content.week_3: Forms, user input, and validation.
weekly_content.week_4: Working with databases using SQLAlchemy.
weekly_content.week_5: Building RESTful APIs and JSON responses.
weekly_content.week_6: Testing and deploying Flask applications.

title: MongoDB for Developers
description: Master MongoDB, the leading NoSQL database. Learn data modeling, CRUD operations, indexing, aggregation, and integration with backend frameworks.
skills: Integrating MongoDB with Node.js and Python

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to MongoDB and installation.
weekly_content.week_2: CRUD operations and querying documents.
weekly_content.week_3: Schema design and data modeling best practices.
weekly_content.week_4: Indexing and aggregation pipelines.
weekly_content.week_5: Security, backups, and integration with apps.

title: Express.js Web Development
description: Learn to build fast and scalable backend applications with Express.js, the minimalist Node.js framework. Cover routing, middleware, APIs, and integration with databases.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Express.js and project setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Routing and middleware fundamentals.
weekly_content.week_3: Working with views and templating engines.
weekly_content.week_4: Building RESTful APIs and handling JSON.
weekly_content.week_6: Database integration and deploying apps.

title: MEAN Stack Development
description: Build powerful full-stack web applications using the MEAN stack: MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js. Learn how to develop scalable, maintainable, and modern web apps with a unified JavaScript codebase.
skills: MongoDB: NoSQL databases and data modeling

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to the MEAN stack and setting up the environment.
weekly_content.week_2: MongoDB basics and schema design.
weekly_content.week_3: Building RESTful APIs with Express.js and Node.js.
weekly_content.week_4: Introduction to Angular and creating components.
weekly_content.week_6: Connecting Angular frontend with Express backend.

title: Ruby on Rails Web Development
description: Build powerful, scalable web applications quickly with Ruby on Rails. Learn MVC architecture, routing, database integration, and deploying Rails apps.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Ruby and Rails environment setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Understanding MVC and routing in Rails.
weekly_content.week_3: Working with models and Active Record.
weekly_content.week_4: Building views and templates.
weekly_content.week_6: Testing Rails applications.

title: Web Development with Actix (Rust)
description: Create high-performance, reliable web applications using Actix, a powerful Rust web framework. Learn routing, middleware, async programming, and secure backend development.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Rust and Actix setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Basic routing and handlers in Actix.
weekly_content.week_3: Middleware and managing app state.
weekly_content.week_4: Async programming and concurrency.
weekly_content.week_6: Security best practices and testing.

title: MySQL for Developers
description: Master relational databases with MySQL! Learn to design schemas, write powerful SQL queries, and integrate MySQL with backend applications.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to relational databases and MySQL installation.
weekly_content.week_2: Creating databases, tables, and basic SQL queries.
weekly_content.week_3: Advanced queries: joins, subqueries, and aggregate functions.
weekly_content.week_4: Schema design, normalization, and relationships.
weekly_content.week_6: User management, security, and integrating MySQL with backend apps.

title: Perl Programming
description: Master Perl — the powerful scripting language for text processing, system automation, and backend development. Learn to write robust scripts and automate complex tasks with ease.
skills: Automating tasks and working with databases

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Perl, installation, and scripting basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Working with variables, control structures, and arrays.
weekly_content.week_3: Regular expressions, pattern matching, and file operations.
weekly_content.week_4: Subroutines, modules, and Perl package management.
weekly_content.week_5: Automating tasks and integrating Perl with databases and the shell.

title: IT Automation
description: Automate repetitive IT tasks and boost efficiency using powerful tools and scripting languages. Learn to streamline workflows, manage systems, and eliminate manual processes.
skills: Scheduling with cron and task scheduler

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to IT automation and scripting basics.
weekly_content.week_2: Shell scripting: automating tasks in Unix/Linux systems.
weekly_content.week_3: Python scripting for file, network, and system automation.
weekly_content.week_4: Task scheduling and job automation (cron, at, Task Scheduler).
weekly_content.week_5: Ansible fundamentals: provisioning, configuration, and playbooks.
weekly_content.week_6: Automation in real-world IT environments: monitoring, deployments, and logs.

title: Network Security
description: Protect networks against intrusions, attacks, and data breaches. Learn essential tools, protocols, and best practices to secure IT infrastructure and defend against threats.

weekly_content.week_1: Foundations of network security and common threats.
weekly_content.week_2: Firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention, and network segmentation.
weekly_content.week_3: Secure protocols: SSL/TLS, SSH, VPNs, and tunneling.
weekly_content.week_4: Network scanning, penetration testing, and vulnerability assessment.
weekly_content.week_5: Wireless security, encryption standards, and securing Wi-Fi networks.
weekly_content.week_6: Monitoring, packet analysis with Wireshark, and best practices in access control.

title: Computer Forensics
description: Investigate digital crimes and uncover hidden evidence! Learn how to collect, analyze, and preserve digital data in a forensically sound manner for use in legal or corporate investigations.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to computer forensics and investigation process.
weekly_content.week_2: Understanding storage media and data acquisition methods.
weekly_content.week_3: Recovering deleted files, analyzing file systems and hidden data.
weekly_content.week_4: Analyzing logs, emails, and internet artifacts.
weekly_content.week_5: Using forensic tools and documenting evidence.
weekly_content.week_6: Reporting findings, maintaining chain of custody, and preparing for court.

title: Concepts of Programming Languages
description: Explore the fundamental principles behind programming languages! Learn syntax, semantics, paradigms, and implementation models across a wide variety of languages.
skills: Data Types, Control Structures, and Scoping
Comparative Study of Language Design (C, Python, Lisp, Prolog, etc.)

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to language design and classification.
weekly_content.week_2: Syntax, semantics, and parsing concepts.
weekly_content.week_3: Data types, variables, and control flow across paradigms.
weekly_content.week_4: Subroutines, parameter passing, and scope rules.
weekly_content.week_5: Memory management, stack vs heap, and garbage collection.
weekly_content.week_6: Functional, logic, and object-oriented paradigms in depth.
weekly_content.week_7: Interpreters vs compilers, and comparing real-world languages.

title: Design Patterns
description: Write cleaner, more maintainable, and scalable code with proven software design patterns. Learn how to recognize, implement, and apply patterns in real-world applications.
skills: Pattern Application in Real Projects (Java, Python, etc.)

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to design principles (SOLID) and the role of patterns.
weekly_content.week_2: Creational patterns: Singleton, Factory Method, Builder.
weekly_content.week_3: Structural patterns: Adapter, Composite, Decorator.
weekly_content.week_4: Behavioral patterns: Observer, Command, Strategy.
weekly_content.week_5: Implementing patterns in Java and Python with UML examples.
weekly_content.week_6: Best practices, anti-patterns, and real-world design case studies.

title: Secure Coding
description: Write software that’s secure by design! Learn how to identify and prevent common vulnerabilities, follow best practices, and build applications that resist attacks.
skills: Secure coding principles (input validation, least privilege, etc.)
Buffer overflows, injection attacks, and XSS/CSRF prevention
Security in web, mobile, and API development
Secure code review and static analysis tools

weekly_content.week_1: Fundamentals of secure coding and threat modeling.
weekly_content.week_2: Understanding the OWASP Top 10 and common coding pitfalls.
weekly_content.week_3: Secure input validation, output encoding, and error handling.
weekly_content.week_4: Authentication, session management, and secure storage.
weekly_content.week_5: Code review practices and using static/dynamic analysis tools.
weekly_content.week_6: Secure architecture patterns and applying security to real projects.

title: Project Management
description: Master the art of planning, executing, and leading successful tech projects. Learn methodologies, tools, and leadership skills to deliver results on time and within budget.
skills: Progress tracking with tools like Trello, Jira, MS Project

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to project management and lifecycle phases.
weekly_content.week_2: Understanding Agile, Scrum, and traditional approaches.
weekly_content.week_3: Defining scope, timelines, and resource planning.
weekly_content.week_4: Risk management, quality assurance, and budgeting.
weekly_content.week_6: Using tools (Trello, Jira), reporting, and post-project reviews.

title: Visual Programming
description: Learn programming through visual, block-based interfaces! Ideal for beginners, educators, and creative minds—build interactive projects without writing code line-by-line.
skills: Control flow and loops with visuals
Working with sprites, animations, and media
Project creation in Scratch, Blockly, and MIT App Inventor
Transitioning from visual to text-based coding

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to visual programming and environments (Scratch, Blockly).
weekly_content.week_2: Understanding logic: loops, conditionals, and variables in a visual context.
weekly_content.week_3: Creating interactive projects with events, sounds, and motion.
weekly_content.week_4: Building games and apps with drag-and-drop components.
weekly_content.week_5: Project showcase, debugging, and transitioning to real code.

title: Parallel Processing
description: Unlock the power of parallelism to speed up computation! Learn concepts, architectures, and programming techniques to write efficient concurrent programs.
skills: Shared memory and distributed memory models
Performance tuning and debugging parallel programs

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to parallel processing concepts and architectures.
weekly_content.week_2: Threading basics and process management.
weekly_content.week_3: Synchronization primitives: mutexes, semaphores, and locks.
weekly_content.week_4: Parallel algorithms and common design patterns.
weekly_content.week_5: Distributed memory models and message passing (MPI).
weekly_content.week_6: GPU programming basics with CUDA.

title: Application Software Security
description: Learn how to design, develop, and maintain secure applications. Understand common software vulnerabilities and implement security best practices to protect your software from threats.
skills: Secure coding techniques for web, mobile, and desktop apps
Using security tools and static analysis

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to software security and SSDLC.
weekly_content.week_2: Understanding common software vulnerabilities.
weekly_content.week_3: Authentication, authorization, and session management.
weekly_content.week_4: Secure coding techniques for different application types.
weekly_content.week_5: Threat modeling, risk analysis, and mitigation strategies.
weekly_content.week_6: Security testing, code reviews, and using automated tools.

title: Internetworking & Routing Protocols
description: Understand how networks communicate and scale by mastering routing protocols and internetworking concepts. Learn to design, configure, and troubleshoot interconnected networks using real-world tools and practices.
skills: Troubleshooting with Cisco Packet Tracer or GNS3

weekly_content.week_1: Overview of internetworking, IP addressing, and subnetting.
weekly_content.week_2: Router configuration basics and introduction to static routing.
weekly_content.week_3: Dynamic routing protocols: RIP and EIGRP.
weekly_content.week_4: Advanced routing with OSPF and BGP overview.
weekly_content.week_6: Interconnecting dissimilar networks (IPv4/IPv6, WAN links).
weekly_content.week_7: Routing protocol comparison, network design, and troubleshooting labs.

title: Interconnecting Networks
description: Learn how to connect and configure different types of networks. Explore devices, media, and protocols that form the foundation of modern internetworking.
skills: Basic configuration with Cisco Packet Tracer

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to network types, devices, and layered models.
weekly_content.week_2: IP addressing, subnetting, and default gateway concepts.
weekly_content.week_3: Switching, VLANs, and inter-VLAN routing.
weekly_content.week_4: Routing concepts: static routes and gateways.
weekly_content.week_5: WAN technologies and connecting remote networks.
weekly_content.week_6: Network configuration and testing using simulation tools.

title: Knowledge Representation & Reasoning
description: Teach machines how to represent and reason about the world! Learn how knowledge is structured, stored, and used in AI systems to make intelligent decisions.
skills: Applications in AI planning and reasoning engines

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to KRR and its role in Artificial Intelligence.
weekly_content.week_2: Propositional and predicate logic for representing facts.
weekly_content.week_3: Reasoning with inference: forward and backward chaining.
weekly_content.week_4: Semantic networks, ontologies, and knowledge graphs.
weekly_content.week_5: Expert systems, rules, and decision trees.
weekly_content.week_6: Case studies: reasoning in robotics, NLP, and AI planning.

title: Tailwind CSS
description: Style modern web interfaces with speed and flexibility using Tailwind CSS! Master utility-first design and build responsive, custom UIs without writing traditional CSS.
skills: Working with Tailwind and frameworks (React, Vue, etc.)

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Tailwind CSS and utility-first design.
weekly_content.week_2: Responsive design, layouts, and spacing.
weekly_content.week_3: Customizing themes, dark mode, and plugins.
weekly_content.week_4: Building a complete UI and deploying your project.

title: Bootstrap 5
description: Build responsive, mobile-first websites quickly with Bootstrap! Learn how to use ready-made components and utility classes to streamline your frontend development.

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to Bootstrap and grid-based layouts.
weekly_content.week_2: Using components and creating navigation systems.
weekly_content.week_3: Styling forms, tables, and handling responsiveness.
weekly_content.week_4: Custom themes and building a multi-page project.

title: Vue.js
description: Build powerful, modern web interfaces with Vue.js! Learn reactive programming, component-based architecture, and how to integrate Vue into full-stack applications.
skills: Working with APIs and lifecycle hooks
Building and deploying full Vue.js applications

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to Vue.js, setup, and first app.
weekly_content.week_2: Templates, directives (v-if, v-for), and data binding.
weekly_content.week_3: Creating and communicating between components.
weekly_content.week_4: Vue Router for building single-page applications.
weekly_content.week_5: State management with Vuex and working with APIs.
weekly_content.week_6: Project: building and deploying a complete Vue.js web app.

title: Grunt
description: Automate your frontend workflow with Grunt! Learn how to speed up development tasks like minification, compilation, linting, and live reloading using one of JavaScript’s earliest task runners.
skills: Working with plugins (uglify, sass, concat, watch)
Integrating Grunt with larger development workflows

weekly_content.week_1: Intro to Grunt, setting up Gruntfile.js, and using basic tasks.
weekly_content.week_2: Using core plugins for minification, compiling Sass, and watching files.
weekly_content.week_3: Building complete workflows and integrating Grunt with real projects.

title: PostgreSQL
description: Master the power of PostgreSQL, an advanced open-source relational database. Learn how to design schemas, write efficient queries, and manage data securely and reliably.
skills: SQL queries: SELECT, JOIN, GROUP BY, etc.

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to PostgreSQL, setup, and basic SQL queries.
weekly_content.week_2: Data modeling, table creation, constraints, and relationships.
weekly_content.week_3: Advanced querying with joins, subqueries, and aggregations.
weekly_content.week_4: Transactions, indexing, and performance optimization.
weekly_content.week_6: User management, security, backups, and final project.

title: React Native
description: Build beautiful and performant mobile apps using React Native! Learn how to develop cross-platform iOS and Android apps using JavaScript and React principles.
skills: UI components and styling with Flexbox
State management with Context and Redux
Deploying apps to Android and iOS

weekly_content.week_1: Introduction to React Native and project setup.
weekly_content.week_2: Building layouts with core components and Flexbox styling.
weekly_content.week_3: Navigation between screens using React Navigation.
weekly_content.week_4: State management with useState, Context API, and Redux.
weekly_content.week_5: Working with APIs, async storage, and user input.
weekly_content.week_6: Testing, debugging, and deploying to iOS and Android stores.
